title: Unpacking Asprotect SKE 2.1
content:
Since AsProtect is pretty dated, I was wondering if there is any tools out there that can do the unpacking for the user. If not, I guess manual is the way to go.
In case of manual mode, I would love it if you could point some papers.

answers_data.content: For this packer, I have successfully used this script by VolX: ASProtect 1.3x - 2.xx Unpacker v1.15F.  You still need an external tool for the IAT reconstruction (I mostly use Scylla), but the script provides all the parameters required.
